text: Allahe eta drstanta upasthapana karaiche: Ejana byakti, yara ke'ibajano maniba ache, yisakala paraspara biraud'dhabhabapanna, arau ana ejana manuha, yijana kerala ejana manibara anugata; e'i dujana byaktira arastha eke haâ€™ba paraene? Sakalo dharanara prasansa kerala allaharae'i; kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i najane
